channel.title: Groundhog Day on Not So Fungible
channel.description: Recent content in Groundhog Day on Not So Fungible

item.title: Lessons from Groundhog Day
item.description: The strange thing about this film is that it’s worth watching repeatedly. That’s usually just the mark of a good film, but given the premise involves a man repeating a single day of his life for what appears to be several subjective decades (or perhaps centuries), there’s a certain sense of the appropriate in its revisitability. On this watching, I was struck by something that I’d somehow missed the implications of before.
